paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the association of short QT intervals with atrial arrhythmias, particularly atrial flutter, and mentions the KCNH2 gene in the context of genetic mutations leading to short QT syndrome. However, no specific genetic variants in the KCNH2 gene are detailed in the text.

challenges: The paper does not provide specific variant data for the KCNH2 gene.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper mentions the KCNH2 gene in the context of genetic mutations associated with short QT syndrome but does not provide specific variant information or penetrance data.
